Class Setup

java.lang.Object
com.example.Setup
public class Setup extends Object
A class handling the setup of a new game or loading an old one

  • Method Details

    • load

      public int[] load(List<Player> players, List<Tile> tiles, List<Bonus> bonusTiles) throws EndGame
      Creating a new game or loading an old one
      Parameters:
      players - - the list of players
      tiles - - the list of tiles
      bonusTiles - - the list of bonus tiles
      Returns:
      int[] - an array containing extra information about the loaded game (turn, currentPlayerIndex, currentPlayerThrown)
      Throws:
      EndGame - - if the setup failed or was cancelled

    • newGame

      public void newGame(List<Player> players, List<Tile> tiles, List<Bonus> bonusTiles) throws EndGame
      Creating a new game
      Parameters:
      players - - the list of players
      tiles - - the list of tiles
      bonusTiles - - the list of bonustiles
      Throws:
      EndGame - - if the new game setup was cancelled

    • loadFromFile

      public int[] loadFromFile(List<Player> players, List<Tile> tiles, List<Bonus> bonusTiles) throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      Loading the game from a saved file (gamesave.txt)
      Parameters:
      players - - the list of players
      tiles - - the list of tiles
      bonusTiles - - the list of bonustiles
      Returns:
      int[] - an array containing extra information about the loaded game (turn, currentPlayerIndex, currentPlayerThrown)
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - - if the class couldnt be found
      IOException - - if an io exception happens
